info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 01 at 6:09PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Madison, southeastern Beaverhead and Gallatin Counties through 715 PM MDT... At 608 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 18 miles northwest of Big Timber to 19 miles northwest of Crescent Lake to 10 miles south of Lima. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and an intense burst of rain, snow, or graupel. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bozeman, Virginia City, Belgrade, Manhattan, Ennis, Lima, Monida, Alder, Dell, Big Sky, Bannack Pass, Targhee Pass, Cameron, Snowline, Red Rock Pass, Amsterdam, Four Corners, Jeffers, Madison Buffalo Jump State Park and Norris. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
